tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
quoteText:
We may permanently or temporarily suspend your use of the Houzz Platform at any time for any reason, without any notice or liability to you.
We may terminate your account at any time for any or no reason, including if you violate any Houzz policy (including the Acceptable Use Policy or Prohibited Products Policy).
